body_html:
Looking at what you have provided, the glibc version is "2.2.5", which according to https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/glibc/ was released in 2002.

I've had similar issues on an old RHEL6 box, there is a thread about it with a work around; you basically have to setup an environment by exporting LD_* variables to point to a newer version of GLIBC.

body:
Looking at what you have provided, the glibc version is "2.2.5", which according to https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/glibc/ was released in 2002.

I've had similar issues on an old RHEL6 box, there is a thread about it with a work around; you basically have to setup an environment by exporting LD_\* variables to point to a newer version of GLIBC.
